channel.title: Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings

item.title: A Practical Demo of Zero-Downtime Migrations Using Password Hashing
item.description: A practical demo of the zero-downtime migration pattern: run old + new password hash formats side-by-side, migrate users on login, and remove legacy safely. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/a-practical-demo-of-zero-downtime-migrations-using-password-hashing

item.title: Solving the Distributed Cache Invalidation Problem with Redis and HybridCache
item.description: Learn how to solve the distributed cache invalidation problem in .NET 9 by implementing a Redis Pub/Sub backplane to synchronize HybridCache instances across multiple nodes. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/solving-the-distributed-cache-invalidation-problem-with-redis-and-hybridcache
